ENV.description: Set this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name. By default it is MASTER User

ALIVE_MSG.description: Set Custom Alive Message When entering .alive Or .master  Command.

AWAKE_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for awake pic in .awake Or .bot command.

OP_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for OP pic in .op command.

PING_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for PING pic in .ping command.

ALIVE_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for alive pic in .alive.

ALIVE_EMOJI.description: Put here any emoji. Which Will be Show When U Do .alive.

BIO_MSG.description: Put Your Telegram Bio Here Required For Auto Bio.

PM_PIC.description: put here any telegraph media link for custom pmpermit pic.

PM_MSG.description: Enter Your custom pm permit msg.
PM_MSG.value: Hello ! I'm Work Right Now..I Will Reply To You, Until then, do not message me anymore you too will be blocked from ï¼­ğšŠÌƒğšœğšğšÌğš›âšğ™±ğš˜Ìƒğšƒ thank you !!

MAX_FLOOD_IN_PM.description: Now U Can Set Custom Flood In DM / PM by default it is 5

LOGGER_ID.description: Create a private channel. And get it's id from @missrose_bot and paste here. Value should start with -100

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter your friends user id to to give him bot full access

SUDO_COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: Please enter sudo user command handler

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: U can Change Ur command Handler By Default it is (.)

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value May result In Account Ban.

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Copy Group Id And paste here To Get Plugin Channel ID copy and paste here

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and copy the username of your bot.

NO_OF_BUTTONS.description: Set The Amount Of Buttons Displayed In legend Command default 7

NO_OF_COLUMNS.description: Set The Amount Of Rows You Want To Displayed In legend Command default 2

EMOJI_IN_HELP1.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command!!

EMOJI_IN_HELP2.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command!!

PM_DATA.description: Type DISABLE if you want to disable pm protection...
